name: One Light
description:
In this game you walk through a forest with a light.

But if your light is turned on, then ur light left runs down.
if your light left equals zero you can't turn on your light
anymore. If your light is turned off monsters will spawn. and if 
they can catch you you die. if you turn on your light again.
the monsters will despawn. There are also little lights on the 
path. if you take one your light left will get back up again.
Try and make it to the end of the path...

Made by: Daan Vos(14) and Midas Scheffers(14)

this is our first real game and we hope you will enjoy it.
